name: 英國文學：中古時期至十八世紀（一）
restrict: ◎限本系(含雙主修)修習◎限大二修習
goals: to introduce students to the range of writing in English from the Medieval period up to the eighteenth century
syllabus:
**Course Description and Objectives:**

This yearlong survey course aims to broaden students’ knowledge and to form a working outline of English literary history, with the second semester covering from the Renaissance to the early 18th Century. The reading mainly focuses on the canonical authors who represent important literary and cultural concerns of their time, and the assignments span genres including romance, epic, ballad, poetry, drama, critical essay and film. Perspectives from historical contexts and literary/critical theory would be brought into the reading as a vehicle for further delving into the core significance of the literary works.

**Requirements:**

1.  Grading policy: ¨Attendance & participation 10%  ¨Group presentation 20%  ¨Exams 70%
2.  Punctuality in coming to the class and turning in your homework is strongly desired. Exceptions are allowed only under emergent circumstances or notification in advance.
3.  Students will hand in their homework only in electronic text on Moodle. No late homework would be accepted.
4.  Any student who plagiarizes or edits writing of others without acknowledgement would fail the course.
